alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Oneida, western Otsego, Broome, Madison, west central Delaware, southeastern Cayuga, Cortland, northeastern Tioga, Onondaga, eastern Tompkins and Chenango Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cicero to near Preble to near Newark Valley. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Binghamton, Rome, Cicero, De Witt, Cortland, Sullivan and Johnson City. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 3 and 31. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 70 North and 72. Interstate 88 between 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Otsego; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Tioga; Tompkins
